From administrator@test.t-unwired.com Wed Apr 29 19:13:45 2009 From: "Administrator Test T-Unwired" <administrator@test.t-unwired.com> X-KMail-Identity: 464085227 To: cpe.production@auth.test.t-unwired.com Subject: Re: TUnwired processo di registrazione utente residenziale con CPE: notifica produzione CPE cliente "workflow test", indirizzo installazione "Via Volturno, 12 50100 Firenze (FI)", UID "37723e2d-d052-4c13-a1e9-134563eb9666" Date: Wed, 29 Apr 2009 19:13:45 +0200 User-Agent: KMail/1.11.2 (Linux/2.6.27.21-170.2.56.fc10.x86_64; KDE/4.2.2; x86_64; ; ) References: <49F88A5A.mailCEZ11AOFY@test.trust-engine.com> In-Reply-To: <49F88A5A.mailCEZ11AOFY@test.trust-engine.com> X-KMail-QuotePrefix: > X-KMail-Link-Message: 10797 X-KMail-Link-Type: reply X-KMail-Transport: administrator@test.t-unwired.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: Text/Plain; charset="iso-8859-15" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Content-Disposition: inline X-KMail-Recipients: cpe.production@auth.test.t-unwired.com Message-Id: <200904291913.46045.administrator@test.t-unwired.com> Status: R X-Status: NQ X-KMail-EncryptionState: X-KMail-SignatureState: X-KMail-MDN-Sent:
On Wednesday 29 April 2009 19:11:54 workfloweng@test.trust-engine.com wrote: > Produzione della CPE. > * cliente > workflow test > > * indirizzo installazione: > Via Volturno, 12 > 50100 Firenze (FI) > > * email: > workflow.test@test.trust-engine.com > > * codice identificativo TUnwired (UID): > 37723e2d-d052-4c13-a1e9-134563eb9666 > > In allegato il certificato da installare sulla CPE e il file leggimi.txt > contente le informazioni necessarie per l'installazione. A produzione > completata effettuare un reply-to all'indirizzo pre-impostato
